comments:
Testing MBJlistTest.java in JVEBEANS02... it will not show in the VE. This used
to work. Here's a reproducable test case w/o all the settings that is in
MBJListTest.java.

Create a class extending JPanel, change the layout to BorderLayout, drop a JList
into the center of the JPanel.
Add the following statement two statements to initialize an indexed array and
set the selectionIndices property via the source viewer:
	int ivjIndices [] = {1,2};
	jList.setSelectedIndices(ivjIndices);
This causes the viewers to go blank and a NPE is thrown in the .log. Here's the
stack trace information:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.model.BeanDeclModel.isPriority(Unknown
Source)
	at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.model.BeanDeclModel.getBeans(Unknown
Source)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.JavaBeanModelBuilder.analyzeEvents(Unknown
Source)
	at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.JavaBeanModelBuilder.build(Unknown
Source)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.core.JavaSourceTranslator.decodeDocument(Unknown
Source)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.core.JavaSourceTranslator.loadModel(Unknown
Source)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.editorpart.JavaVisualEditorPart$Setup.run(Unknown
Source)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Unknown Source)
